headline: Fidelity National (FIS) Expands Visa Partnership for Advanced Payment Solutions
summary: Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (NYSE:FIS) is one of the 10 undervalued tech stocks flying under Wall Street’s radar. On June 26, the company announced that it has expanded its partnership with Visa (NYSE:V) to provide new payment solutions for financial institutions. According to the statement, the expanded collaboration focuses on delivering innovative payment solutions […]
